title: Your Top three mastery Champions have just come to your house and are now living with you.
body:
What Happens

For me: {{champion:24}}, {{champion:44}}, {{champion:78}}

My house is super glamorized, the local neighborhood watch is looking for a purple cloaked man who keeps ripping the lamp posts from the ground and assaulting the neighbors, and to top it all off, A small female dwarf vigilantly has been sending criminals to the hospital with shattered kneecaps and talking about hammer diplomacy!
  http://www.graphics20.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/How-Are-You-Graphics-85.gif

replies.body:
{{champion:41}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:75}} 

Either:
A) Sion's murderous tendencies constantly conflict with Nasus while Gangplank keeps planning his revenge
B) We have a really epic farm. Primary crop is oranges

{{champion:21}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:40}} 

You know, I don't really have a problem with this.

{{champion:103}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:39}} 

 ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

{{champion:99}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:45}} 

So... got two lovebirds and an evil gnome in my house... Bills are paid, food is in the house, and there's an annoying step stool in the middle of the kitchen because the damn evil bastard claims he can't reach anything.

{{champion:45}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:17}}

Veigar has claimed the entire upstairs as his quarters, Sion won't stop polishing his ax and slamming his face off the walls (He says something about "wanting to feel something again") and Teemo... well he worries me the most, because I can't find him.
he's in your shower... waiting O_O

{{champion:23}} wont get out of the bathroom.
{{champion:223}} wont let anybody else eat.
{{champion:432}} keeps quitting his job to persue a music career.

All the animals in the woods have gone missing. People have been randomly attacking others without reason and there has been mysterious sounds of someone crying. {{champion:107}}{{champion:266}} {{champion:32}}

{{champion:80}} You are privileged to have me raid your fridge!
 {{champion:41}} I'm a fair and just roommate. Now do the dishes or your next roommate will be Nautilus!
 {{champion:201}} Troublemaker toss is best game! Also I found another stray Poro! Can we keep him?
This just made me want a Brotheon skin :p

{{champion:432}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:81}} 

My house is filling up with meeps, my neighbors all went missing and all of my belongings somehow end up inside of museums.

{{champion:62}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:37}} 

Wu, take Gnar with you and go see a movie ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:103}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:107}}  HIDE YO CHILDREN HIDE YO WIVES THEY 1 SHOTTING ERRYBODY OUTHERE

{{champion:21}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:110}} 

Am I the only one who sees the problem with this?
then cho chokes on skarner
One ton gem scorpions aren't nearly as edible as one might think

{{champion:223}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:32}}

My grocery bill is so high...
What happened to my tissue boxes?
WHY ARE MY CARPETS SOAKED?
Amumu, calm down.  Don't flip the table.  Please.
Malz, I thought you were going to teach the voidlings to use litter boxes.
Why is there a portal in the middle of the kitchen?
TAHM DON'T EAT THE VOIDLINGS!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 
(help me)
{{champion:223}} ate all my food, {{champion:4}} spent all my money, and {{champion:133}} is just... Doing what she does?
{{champion:133}} bird related stuff.
https://i.imgflip.com/b7mh8.jpg

{{champion:55}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:103}}  Ive got a feeling, tonights gonna be a good night. Tonights gonna be a good good night.

Things would have gotten awkward if we had went down to 4th and 5th {{champion:27}} {{champion:63}} .
All three of those people seem like the type that would literally kill you if you tried anything, but hey. You do you.

> [{quoted}](name=ClockHead,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=GZsTTv7N,comment-id=00230000,timestamp=2015-11-08T07:51:44.113+0000)
>
> All three of those people seem like the type that would literally kill you if you tried anything, but hey. You do you.

What a way to go though.

{{champion:133}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:11}}

I practice my martial artsing with Yi, my crossbowing with Quinn, and my shotgunning with Graves.
Quinn and Graves have a major falling out after a severe ... misunderstanding.

https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQik9-WA4hnwGq3UVIX4TZiFD6zPXz6ULnrD3Xf8IMZCGllop3iwA

Master Yi unsuccessfully tries to keep the peace and I soon move out of that warzone.

{{champion:37}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:89}} 

So while my apartment has become a much brighter and less lonely place, the noise complaints about Mordekaiser and Sona practicing music and Leona physically training are a bother, although considering I give less than two shits about my neighbors, I don't really consider that too much of a downside. Also, there is someone who keeps knocking at our door claiming to be Mordekaiser and Leona's child from the future... Strange I know, I myself figured Sona would have been the first one Mordekaiser knocked up with how they get on in the bedroom on the weekends.

http://i.imgur.com/MpegqTW.png

If you see this guy, please tell him -  son or not - the next time he comes in to interrupt Monday Music Madness, Mordekaiser is going to "teach him suffering beyond imagination." Whether or not Leona approves of his attempts to spread word of the sun's praises.

{{champion:268}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:67}} 

a really bad episode of the odd couple

{{champion:412}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:53}} 
The neighbor's are all chained up and being terrorized, there are jump scare boxes and pranks everywhere, and there are constant lightning storms battering the town. ._.

{{champion:134}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:432}} 

Everything in my house has magically been floating since Syndra moved in. Bard, a testament to Syndra's own power has been trying to calm her down with his music. The hyper-active girl's laughing isn't helping her, but at least she has made my house colorful... WHERE ARE ALL THESE COSMIC SPIRITY THINGS COMING FROM!

{{champion:86}}  Keeps running out of the bushes outside of my house screaming at passerby.
{{champion:119}}  Keeps hogging the mirror.
{{champion:64}}  Keeps walking into the walls.

{{champion:12}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:36}}

I feel like Karma and Alistar would try to lock the doctor in the basement, but Mundo will go where he pleases.

{{champion:201}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:22}} 

My house is freezing, full of goats, and full of _laughter_.

hmm i would get a noise complaint from a master of metal shredding guitar, their would be a mysterious case of people getting paralyzed for fifty years and the sighting of a girl with a strange bird on her arm.   {{champion:82}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:133}}

{{champion:99}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:412}}

...welp. My house is now a war zone with me and Lux standing off to the side watching as Lucian and Thresh fight.

Oh boy oh boy....{{champion:111}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:110}} 

Cyborn: Uh... Nautilus can you stop flying for today? Like come on man, it's been 3 weeks since you left your anchor..

{{champion:111}} : Shut up, the anchor just weighs me down! Don't tell me how to live my life! -floats with the titanic song in the backround- lalari lalaru

Cyborn: Jesus, Varus can you help me get him down from there?

{{champion:110}} : I mean... I can try but I need to ready up -begins to set up a giant harpoon- Let it charge up.

Cyborn: Come on man you're going to leave a hole on the roof, then we won't have the end of it from the stupid manager.

{{champion:223}} : Well I can help you get him down as easily my child :D -extends hand-

Cyborn: Tahm shut up, I'm not into gambling and I know you will jus- wait a second.... what is that inside your coat and tophat..?

{{champion:223}} : Uh.... nothing really I was just making sure no one steals any of it -holds the food together- You know how miscrients are these days my child.

Cyborn: Put it back on the fridge, we talked about this already don't take the freaking fo- - cuts as tahm ults away, escaping with the food, returning empty handed- .... you can't stop being fat for once can't you?

{{champion:223}} : Nope :D

As they continue to argue about the missing food, {{champion:110}} misses his harpoon spear by a stupid amount.

Cyborn : I TOLD YOU NOT TO USE THAT, NOW I HAVE TO PAY FOR IT!!

{{champion:110}} : The guilty will know ago-

Cyborn : SHUT UP I'M NOT GUIL-

{{champion:223}} : -devoures cyborn- Hmm... you have a bit of a salt taste about you my child.

Cyborn: -kicking inside tahms stomach- I swear I will end all of you!!

{{champion:111}} : -continues floating, now with the Elder Scrolls Skyrim theme in the background- Larari Lararu <3
{{champion:157}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:236}}  We don't see each other very often. Lee never sees anybody.

{{champion:50}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:75}} 
Me: "Goddammit Swain, I said no worms in the fridge!"
Swain: "Oh sorry, forgot about those ones. Don't worry, I keep them elsewhere now."
Quinn: "WHAT THE FUCK MY PILLOW"
Swain: "... This is just a concidence. I don't keep them in her pillow"
Nasus: "woofe"
Quinn: "DOGE JOKES ARE NOT FUNNY. STOP SLEEPING ON MY PILLOW"
Nasus: ".... such anger. Very personal. Many privacy"
Swain: "Wait, I actually can't find my worms anymore."
\*Valor pretends he can't hear\*
Swain: "Oh. I see. I guess this kind of disrespect is natural for a demacian. This is discrimination."
Me: "What the hell that's not how it works."
Quinn: "What the hell that's not how it works."
Me: "Quinn... let's go get ourselves a kebab..."
Quinn: "Alright, but Valor's grounded. He stays here."
\*Screechs of panic by Valor\*
Nasus: "Hai. How's it being a burdo? I had a friend who was a burdo once."
Valor: " ;-; "

So... 
{{champion:22}} Now really, put an apple on your head!
Me: I'm not sure if... (puts the apple)
{{champion:22}} Ready...? (prepares bow)
{{champion:56}} DARKNESSSSSS
{{champion:22}} Au! (shoots, the room lights up) Where did our summoner go?
{{champion:223}} I don't know (using the arrow as toothpick)

{{champion:43}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:117}} 
Weird cat-squirrel-rat things running about, there are trails of ice all over the house and apparently my living room has been turned into a therapy session with a bunch of random people looking for "inner peace."

{{champion:102}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:45}} 

Shyvana often times has temper tantrums, and sometimes brings home a half charred sheep or goat.

Leona has turned my extra bedroom into a weight room where she works out every day.

Veigar's evil laughter can often be heard from down the hall where he stay in his room most of the time, plotting to conquer the world or atleast destroy it if he can't take it.
{{champion:27}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:16}}  TOXINS EVERYWHERE! And a goat to keep me alive

{{champion:74}} Has turned my basement into his laboratory and only ever comes upstairs to eat and criticize me on how I'm doing everything inadequately.
{{champion:62}} Is constantly pulling practical jokes around the house and whenever I confront him about his share of the rent, he disappears in an explosive cloud.
{{champion:86}} Has decided to be my life coach as long as we're room mates. He has me on a daily exercise regimen and has taken over all the grocery shopping to make sure I stick to a diet. I'm still in charge of cooking and cleaning, however. Sleep no longer exists for me.

Me: {{champion:30}}{{champion:53}}{{champion:31}} 

1. All I'd hear is "Would you like to hear about your lord and savior death?"
2. I might be able to find a gf with that dating service...
3. I'd have no food and I'd need a bigger house...

{{champion:117}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:16}} 
The color of the walls is hurting my eyes. I was made a darn vegan because she "wanted to save me". I am learning to dance... at least this one is useful... the only trouble with her is that she doesn't sleep and practices her dancing... all day and night long.

{{champion:80}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:41}} 

Oddly enough I think Gangplank would be the most mellow out of all of them.  Sion would be...sitting still because I'd try my hardest to not get any reaction out of him.  Pantheon might be fighting Sion or reading up on baking recipes if he isn't doing leg exercises.  Gangplank would probably just be hanging around, eating oranges and reminding me not to ask where he keeps getting cash to supply the fridge.
